author: Special Correspondent
text:
A flying squad on Monday seized Rs. 2.19 lakh from a mini lorry driver at Kulithalai.

Sources said when the officials, who checked the lorry driven by Rangarajan (38) of Boothalur in Thanjavur district, questioned the source of the money he told them that he had been returning from Kerala after off loading a truck of banana at a market. He reportedly showed the receipt pertaining to the sale of banana.
title: Rs. 2.19 lakh seized in Kulithalai
